archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.1: A security event management process should be established to identify, investigate, and help respond to security-related events (including indicators of compromise (IOC)) which may be supported by a Security Operations Centre (SOC) or equivalent.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
